author: @wluctv6
title: Curbside solid waste & recycling collection postponed for portions of Marquette
text:
Curbside solid waste & recycling collection postponed for portions of Marquette
Published: Mar. 5, 2025 at 6:26 PM EST|Updated: 11 minutes ago
MARQUETTE, Mich. (WLUC) - Due to Wednesday’s blizzard, the city of Marquette says Wednesday night curbside solid waste and recycling collection for the city has been postponed.
Residents in Zone 3 (South Marquette) – south of Grove Street and south of the US-41 bypass – are affected by this postponement. The city says these residents should wait to place their garbage and recycling curbside until Friday night for collection.
The city says Zone 4 (North Marquette) will be collected Thursday night as usual.
